name: FlappyTheRythm!
description:
Hi! 

I have a while without uploading a new game, I'm was busy, but here is my last indie release.
It is a simple game inspired on flappy bird but with some extra features.

You can enjoy good techno music with your musical sphere. You can customize your sphere, changing his color on the shop.

Beat your personal record, and try to reach the most far you can!

The game has a save system, so when you buy some color or break a new score, it will be saved on your device.

Hope you enjoy! Good luck
